Meet the Team Behind PV Industries

Powered by People, Driven by Purpose

Join us Our values

At PV Industries, our strength lies in our people. We're a passionate, diverse, and experienced team united by a common goal: creating a cleaner, more sustainable future through responsible solar recycling.

Meet the team

James Petesic

Co-Founder

Timothy Dawson

Co-Founder

Tom Witheridge

Head of Engineering & Operations

Who We Are

Sustainability Advocates

We're driven by the belief that clean energy should never come at the cost of the environment. Our team is committed to closing the loop on solar waste and building smarter, circular systems for the future.

Industry Experts

With backgrounds in renewable energy, waste management, logistics, environmental science, and engineering, our multidisciplinary team brings deep knowledge and hands-on experience to every project.

Problem Solvers

Every job is different, and we thrive on that. Whether it's a complex utility-scale solar decommissioning or a community recycling initiative, we approach each challenge with creativity and precision.

Collaborators

At PV Industries, we don't work in silos. We collaborate across teams—and with our customers—to deliver tailored solutions that exceed expectations.

What We Value as a Team

Our culture is shaped by shared values that guide how we work with each other, with our customers, and with the environment.

01

Trust & Transparency

We believe in honest communication, integrity, and accountability—from our warehouse floor to boardroom meetings.

"Open dialogue builds stronger partnerships"
02

Innovation

Our team embraces new technologies and smarter ways of working to stay at the forefront of solar panel recycling.

"Always looking for the next breakthrough"
03

Customer Focus

Every department at PV Industries is focused on helping our customers succeed and meeting their sustainability goals.

"Your success drives our mission"
04

Respect & Teamwork

We foster a positive, inclusive, and collaborative environment where everyone is heard, supported, and empowered to make an impact.

"Every voice matters, every contribution counts"

Faces Behind the Mission

While we come from different backgrounds, we're united by one mission: To lead Australia in solar panel recycling and circular economy solutions.

James Petesic Co-Founder
Timothy Dawson Co-Founder
Tom Witheridge Head of Engineering & Operations

You'll find us:

Coordinating logistics from our Sydney HQ
Conducting site assessments in the field
Processing materials at our recycling facilities
Collaborating with clients on custom recycling strategies
Working behind the scenes to improve safety, compliance, and sustainability

What Our Team Members Say

"Working at PV Industries has given me the opportunity to contribute to a cleaner future while growing professionally. Everyone here is passionate about what they do, and that energy is contagious."

– Tom W.

Environmental Specialist

"I love that no two days are the same. We're solving real challenges and helping the country transition to a sustainable energy model—it's meaningful work."

– Jackson L.

Operations Manager

05

Join the PV Industries Team

Are you passionate about renewable energy, sustainability, and creating real change? We're always looking for motivated, values-driven individuals to join our team across Australia.

  • Operations & logistics
  • Customer service & project management
  • Engineering & technical services
  • Administrative and business support
